description:
**Fix Overview**:

This security update addresses issues related to the Remote Desktop Gateway Service, specifically when the service stops responding due to remote procedure calls over HTTP.

1. Install the KB-5044284 update, which includes improvements from the previous KB-5043178 update.
2. Verify the functionality of the Remote Desktop Gateway Service after the update is applied, ensuring that clients remain connected without interruption.

**Details**:
This patch contains critical updates to enhance the reliability and performance of the Remote Desktop Gateway Service, crucial for maintaining stable connections for users. (LLM Synthesized)
